source.name: Tome of Heroes
source.author: Celeste Conowitch, Jeff Lee, Sarah Madsen, Ben McFarland, Kelly Pawlik, Brian Suskind
source.artist: Paola Andreatta, Sol Devia, Basith Ibrahim, Dio Mahesa, David Auden Nash, William O'Brien, Roberto Pitturru, Kiki Moch Rizki, Florian Stitz, Bryan Syme
source.description:
The essential expansion for every 5th Edition game!
Tome of Heroes contains a vast array of tested, original options to create amazing 5E characters:
• Over 70 new subclasses, including the Circle of Bees, Way of the Unerring Arrow, Path of Hellfire, School of Black Powder, and Pugilist • More than 20 new races and subraces, from deer-like alseid, to mechanical gearforged, to aquatic gnomes and arctic elves • Over a dozen new backgrounds, including diplomat, freebooter, gamekeeper, and innkeeper • A shops' worth of equipment, such as firearms, chakrams, glidecloaks, and bombs, plus mounts and clockwork companions • Expanded rules and extensive tables for downtime between adventures – run a trading company, rule a stronghold, manage resource production, and develop your holdings! • New ways of using magic, from manipulating magical plants to drawing draconic runes • Over 50 new spells, including fuse armor, conjure construct, and steam gout
Plus new optional rules for creating a party with a group theme, and for using weapons to affect combat in ways other than dealing damage. All fully compatible with the 5th Edition ruleset! Create heroes of legend, ready to take their places in song and saga!
